Package nl.pim16aap2.armoredElytra.nbtEditor

Interface ArmoredElytraBuilder.IStep0

Enclosing class:
ArmoredElytraBuilder
public static interface ArmoredElytraBuilder.IStep0
Represents the first and last step of the armored elytra build process.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArmoredElytraBuilder.IStep2
    newItem(ArmorTier armorTier)
    Creates a fresh new armored elytra of a specific tier.
    ArmoredElytraBuilder.IStep1
    ofElytra(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack elytra)
    Use an elytra as base item to create the new armored elytra from.

  • Method Details

    • ofElytra

      ArmoredElytraBuilder.IStep1 ofElytra(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack elytra)
      Use an elytra as base item to create the new armored elytra from.
      Parameters:
      elytra - An itemstack that represents an elytra. It does not matter whether the elytra is armored or not.
      Returns:
      The next step of the builder process.

    • newItem

      ArmoredElytraBuilder.IStep2 newItem(ArmorTier armorTier)
      Creates a fresh new armored elytra of a specific tier.
      Parameters:
      armorTier - The tier of the new armored elytra.
      Returns:
      The next step of the builder process.
